this_title: Boston George Famous Without the Fortune Season 1
introduction: George Jung spent his life indulging in the chase. Running alongside an unknown Pablo Escobar, no one saw the kid from Massachusetts making and losing 100 million dollars before the age of 30 and inspire a movie about his life, BLOW, starring Johnny Depp. Suffering from an exhausting journey full of pain, love lost, and addiction in every sense of the word, "Boston George" finds himself broken in a world of fame, without the fortune he chased, reconnecting with friends from all walks of life.
chinese_title: Boston George Famous Without the Fortune Season 1
